Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC

entry.title: [BHS/CHI][Network] - Backbone Incident Notification
entry.content:
Oct 24, 08:03 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/10/2022 15:55 UTC
End Time : 23/10/2022 14:00 UTC
Root cause : A fiber cut occurred between Chicago and Beauharnois
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 21, 18:32 UTC
Update - The fiber cut location has been found.
Intervention is underway.

Oct 21, 03:52 UTC
Update - Update : We have called the supplier. We are waiting for a feedback from them.

Oct 20, 22:31 UTC
Identified - Update : A ticket has been opened with the provider.

Oct 20, 18:01 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/10/2022 15:55 UTC
Service impact : An increase of latency between Canada and USA may appear.
Root cause : A fiber cut is occurring between Chicago and Beauharnois
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working on the issue to solve the incident. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
